Competition Details

Competition

  • Canada wide competition which alternates location between Portage la Prairie, MB and Alma, QC
  • Typically 10-15 universities in attendance
  • Teams act as companies pitching their solution to clients
  • 2022 scenario: Device Detection and Disposal & Detection and Tracking of Perimeter Intruder
